divs: sighting detailsjuly 4th standing on hill fairly good distance from kelso observed a pink barrel shaped object. faintly pulsing it was stationary. stayed that way for 55sec then darted swiftly to the right s\e to kelso several hundreds yards. object made abrupt turn then came back to the exact original spot. it abruptly disappeared in less time that it takes to take a breath. it closely looked like several objects that had been televised on a ufo tv show. stayed within focal view very fast. too fast. stopped and moved instantly. has witnessed two other incidences.
Summary: barrel shaped object observed near kelso wa
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Kelso
There were no other sightings in Kelso on or around July 4th 2002
